about_the_game:
Puzzle action game in which you have to hide in objects.


The player runs through the level and chooses which object to hide in, presses the Q key and disappears into the object, the hunter stops pursuing him, then the countdown starts, after 5 seconds the object will disappear and the player will reappear. And again you need to find an object in which to hide. The player's task is to survive as long as possible.

The player needs to hide in objects from the hunter. Each item has a lifetime, when the object dies the player is thrown out of it.

The player’s task is to stay alive for as long as possible by hiding in objects and score as many points as possible in order to become first on the leaderboard and get achievements.

You can control your character using the WASD key and the mouse.

Leaderboard.
Achievements.
detailed_description:
Puzzle action game in which you have to hide in objects.


The player runs through the level and chooses which object to hide in, presses the Q key and disappears into the object, the hunter stops pursuing him, then the countdown starts, after 5 seconds the object will disappear and the player will reappear. And again you need to find an object in which to hide. The player's task is to survive as long as possible.

The player needs to hide in objects from the hunter. Each item has a lifetime, when the object dies the player is thrown out of it.

The player’s task is to stay alive for as long as possible by hiding in objects and score as many points as possible in order to become first on the leaderboard and get achievements.

You can control your character using the WASD key and the mouse.

Leaderboard.
Achievements.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 64-bit 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
